name: BioShock 2 Special Edition
summary:
Special Edition Includes: 
BioShock 2 game 
Vinyl 180g LP with Bioshock 1 orchestral score and frameable jacket. 
Audio CD with Bioshock 2 orchestral score 
3 vintage Rapture advertisements (rolled) 
Bioshock 2 Art Book, 164 pages, 8 1/2 x 11" and hardcover
